clues.text:
Bankruptcy types are:
A. volumes
B. chapters
C. verses

Poison pills thwart:
A. double takes
B. takeovers
C. undertakers

The process of a firm selling parts of itself is:
A. divestiture
B. expenditure
C. not really sure

Assets like land & machines are:
A. fixed
B. repaired
C. mended

Junk bonds feature:
A. low ceilings
B. high interest
C. Chinese boats

rounds.text: In 1950 the England-Scotland border was closed for the first time in 400 years to try to recover this stolen item
